# [Interview #1125: Changing Hands, AZ, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1125#24)

#### Question

Renarin's eye color?

#### Brandon Sanderson

PAFO - Peter And Find Out. He gets to canonize it.
